results.title: After Shouts of ‘Liar’ and Worse, Biden Takes on His Detractors in Real Time
results.abstract: His State of the Union address was not exactly a celebration of a unity agenda. But the president seemed to relish the scrimmage.

results.adx_keywords: State of the Union Message (US);Presidential Election of 2024;Trump, Donald J;Biden, Joseph R Jr
results.title: Trump stages his own ‘State of the Union’ speech.
results.abstract: The former president excoriated President Biden in a two-minute videotaped message from his South Florida home.

media.caption: Former President Donald J. Trump introducing his South Carolina leadership team during a campaign event in Columbia, S.C., last month.
media.copyright: Nicole Craine for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: State of the Union Message (US);Capitol Building (Washington, DC);Romney, Mitt;Santos, George (1988- )
results.title: Inside the tense exchange between Romney and Santos.
results.abstract: Senator Mitt Romney of Utah admonished Representative George Santos, a fellow Republican and New York freshman, telling him he “shouldn’t have been there.”

media.caption: Senator Mitt Romney of Utah, right, exchanged words with Representative George Santos, a fellow Republican who represents a New York district in Long Island and Queens, before the State of the Union address on Tuesday night.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Comedy and Humor
results.title: Jimmy Fallon Sounds Off on State of the Union Applause
results.abstract: “It was a tough night for all of Biden’s staffers watching from the White House, because every time people clapped, the lights went on and off,” Fallon said.

media.caption: Jimmy Fallon joked that Democrats repeatedly applauding Biden “were just trying to keep him awake.”

results.title: How Can I Convince My Wife That She Cheated Her Siblings?
results.abstract: While dividing up her late mother’s belongings, a woman claimed an extremely valuable artwork for herself, purposely hiding its worth from her fellow heirs.

results.title: A Troubled Mother Faces Murder Charges in Her Young Children’s Deaths
results.abstract: Chilling details emerged at an arraignment of Lindsay Clancy, accused of strangling her three children. Her lawyer argued she was mentally ill, but prosecutors outlined methodical planning leading to the deaths.

media.caption: The police at the scene of Lindsay Clancy’s home in Duxbury, Mass., last month, after her three children were killed.

results.byline: By Jessica Jaglois, Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs and Mitch Smith
results.title: Memphis Officer Texted Photo of Tyre Nichols After Beating, New Documents Show
results.abstract: The revelation came in Memphis police documents related to the firing of five officers who have been charged with murder in Mr. Nichols’s death.

media.caption: A makeshift memorial for Tyre Nichols at the corner where the police beat him, a short walk from his mother’s home.

results.title: 4.9 Million Fabuloso Bottles Recalled for Bacteria Risk

results.title: Man Pleads Guilty to Hate Crimes in El Paso Massacre That Killed 23
results.abstract: Patrick Crusius, 24, agreed to plead guilty to federal charges after prosecutors said they would not seek the death penalty. But he still faces a state trial in which he could be sentenced to death.

media.caption: A memorial at the Walmart in El Paso, Texas, in 2019.

results.adx_keywords: Tennis;Hockey, Ice;Pegula, Jessica (1994- );Pegula, Kim;Hamlin, Damar (1998- );Buffalo Bills;Buffalo Sabres;Buffalo (NY)
results.title: Months Before Hamlin’s Collapse, Bills’ Co-Owner Also Suffered Cardiac Arrest
results.abstract: In an essay, Jessica Pegula, a top-ranked tennis player, described the health ordeal of her mother, Kim Pegula, president of the Buffalo Bills. Hamlin, a defensive back, went into cardiac arrest at a Jan. 2 game.

media.caption: Kim Pegula at a Buffalo Bills game in 2019. Her daughter Jessica, the professional tennis player, described her mother’s recovery from cardiac arrest in an essay in The Players’ Tribune.

results.title: South Carolina Dog Breeder Is Fatally Shot at Planned Sale of French Bulldog
results.abstract: The attackers, who remained at large on Wednesday, also stole the puppy, the authorities said. French bulldogs have become among the most expensive dog breeds in the United States.

media.caption: Lonnie A. Ray was killed on Monday night as he planned to sell a French bulldog for $2,500.

results.title: How Much to See a Movie at AMC? It Will Soon Depend Where You Sit.
results.abstract: By the end of 2023, the movie theater chain will offer tickets at three different price tiers, with middle seats costing the most. You’ll pay less if you like the front row.

media.caption: AMC said its new pricing system would not be applied to tickets for discounted Tuesday screenings or showings before 4 p.m.

results.title: China Sends Spy Balloons Over Military Sites Worldwide, U.S. Officials Say
results.abstract: The balloons have some advantages over the satellites that orbit the earth in regular patterns. They fly closer to earth and can evade radar.

results.title: Searching for Streaming Profit, Disney Cuts $5.5 Billion in Costs
results.abstract: In the company’s first earnings report since Bob Iger returned as C.E.O., it exceeded Wall Street’s expectations. But about 7,000 jobs are expected to be cut.
org_facet: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)

media.caption: Robert A. Iger, Disney’s chief executive, in December. On Wednesday, he announced a restructuring that will consolidate production and distribution, with the exception of sports.
